summary: Certificados (Certificate Generator) feature testing completed. All 16 backend API tests pass. Frontend UI fully functional including contact search, program/level selection, certificate generation with preview, PDF download, and certificate deletion.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/certificados/catalog/programs - Returns 14 programs
Backend: GET /api/certificados/catalog/levels - Returns 4 levels (Commitment, Mastery, Performance, Results)
Backend: GET /api/certificados/search-contact?email=X - Contact found returns contact data
Backend: GET /api/certificados/search-contact - Contact not found returns 404
Backend: POST /api/certificados/generate - Creates certificate with auto-generated number (CERT-YYYY-XXXXX)
Backend: POST /api/certificados/generate - Invalid program returns 400
Backend: POST /api/certificados/generate - Invalid level returns 400
Backend: POST /api/certificados/generate - Contact not found returns 404
Backend: GET /api/certificados/list - Returns certificates list with total count
Backend: GET /api/certificados/{id} - Returns certificate details
Backend: GET /api/certificados/{id} - Non-existent returns 404
Backend: GET /api/certificados/{id}/pdf - Generates PDF file (reportlab)
Backend: GET /api/certificados/{id}/pdf - Non-existent returns 404
Backend: DELETE /api/certificados/{id} - Deletes certificate successfully
Backend: DELETE /api/certificados/{id} - Non-existent returns 404
Backend: Cleanup test data - Test certificates deleted
Frontend: Certificados page loads correctly with stats cards
Frontend: Stats show Total Emitidos, Commitment, Mastery, Results counts
Frontend: 'Nuevo Certificado' button opens dialog
Frontend: Email search field works
Frontend: Contact found message displays with name and company
Frontend: Program selector shows 14 programs
Frontend: Level selector shows 4 levels with descriptions
Frontend: Hours input field works
Frontend: Vista previa (preview) section shows all certificate details
Frontend: 'Generar Certificado' button creates certificate and auto-downloads PDF
Frontend: Certificate list displays all columns (Número, Participante, Programa, Nivel, Horas, Fecha, Acciones)
Frontend: Download PDF button works from list
Frontend: Delete button visible in list
Frontend: Navigation: Delivery > Certificados menu works
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_certificados.py - Created comprehensive pytest test suite (16 tests)
seed_data_creation: Test certificate (Datastory/Commitment) was created and cleaned up after testing. Original certificate CERT-2026-00001 preserved.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Certificados feature fully tested and working. All backend APIs pass (catalog programs/levels, contact search, certificate CRUD, PDF generation). Frontend UI works correctly: email search with contact found display, program/level selectors, hours input, preview section, certificate generation with auto PDF download, list with download/delete actions. The feature was migrated from leaderlix.com/generador-certificados. Test contact: adolfo.trejo@hotmail.com (Adolfo Trejo from BristolMyers Squibb).

programs_catalog.details: 14 programs available: Escucha Activa, Datastory, Arquetipos, Entrevistas, Storyleading, Presentaciones Médicas, Elevator Pitch Médico, Storyselling, Cultura del Acuerdo, Toma de Decisiones, Rockstars de la Ciencia, Lo Hago Contigo, Yo Te Enseño, Masterclass

levels_catalog.details: 4 levels: Commitment (inicial), Mastery (dominio), Performance (alto rendimiento), Results (resultados)

contact_search.details: Searches HubSpot contacts by email. Returns firstname, lastname, company, jobtitle

certificate_generation.details: Creates certificate with auto-generated number (CERT-YYYY-XXXXX), validates program/level, stores in MongoDB

pdf_generation.details: PDF generated with reportlab in landscape format. Includes: LEADERLIX header, level badge, participant name, program name, hours, issue date, certificate number, signature

certificate_list.details: Lists all certificates with pagination. Shows: number, participant, program, level, hours, date, actions

certificate_delete.details: Deletes certificate from database. Returns 404 for non-existent

frontend_dialog.details: 4-step form: 1) Search participant, 2) Select program, 3) Select level, 4) Enter hours. Shows preview before generation

frontend_stats.details: Stats cards show: Total Emitidos, Commitment count, Mastery count, Results count

navigation.details: Certificados accessible via Delivery section in sidebar navigation
